job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes interacting with an AI system (likely an LLM) to resolve issues and then providing feedback to improve that system, which aligns with the concept of refining AI interactions and potentially prompt engineering or fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' and providing feedback on AI-generated solutions, which is a core aspect of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and testing of new tools, which falls under software development and integration, even if the tools are AI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system, which is a form of software integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights an aggressive ramp-up period, implying a need for rapid learning and adaptability to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes self-sufficiency and the ability to solve problems independently, which is a key aspect of problem-solving and pragmatism.

profile.rationale: The role focuses on supporting and improving AI systems rather than developing core AI models or generative AI applications from scratch. While there are tasks related to AI model fine-tuning and improving AI systems (1.B.1, 1.B.2), the primary framing is around customer support and integrating AI capabilities into an existing support structure (1.A.1). The role is not building generative AI products but rather enhancing an AI-augmented support system. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, where AI/ML is a component of the software product being worked on.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI systems and their improvement, but it frames them within a technical support context. The tasks lean towards enhancing existing AI capabilities within a support function rather than core AI development or GenAI specialization. The profile assignment is reasonably confident, but the role's exact nature (more SE focused vs. more AI focused) could be slightly ambiguous without more context on the 'AI systems' mentioned.
